revised_title: The Extraordinary Case of Edward Bright: A Fat Man of Malden
tldr: The article describes the life and death of Edward Bright, a man who weighed over 600 pounds, and provides details about his physical size, health, and lifestyle. Despite his immense size, Bright was known for his strength, activity, and good-natured personality. His death from a miliary fever highlights the challenges of maintaining health in such a corpulent body.
